review_title: Exciting mission, some challenges typical of nonprofits
job_title: Venture Coordinator in Ciudad de Mexico
pros: Strong commitment to supporting high-impact social entrepreneurs and opportunities to travel, meet interesting people, and learn in depth about diverse sectors.
cons: Limited resources to fund salaries and other initiatives, some disorganization, and difficulties maintaining consistent brand/philosophy across global offices.

job_title: Program Director in Ciudad de Mexico
cons: lack of global leadership and CEO micro manages decisions

review_title: Good if you know what you want to get out of the experience
job_title: Program Manager in Ciudad de Mexico
pros: There are great people working there and it can be an incredible platform to learn about social entrepreneurship in any region
cons: The organization should be doing much more. No room for real change.

review_title: Both great and terrible organization where to work
pros: Organization provides fredoom to create and pursue ideas. Allows for flexibility and have great work-life balance
cons: Little global management, bureocratic (in the worst sense)
